name: TurnaroundChurch
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Turnaround Church provides resources for those new to the faith journey or those that have been on the journey for years. We publish Next Steps Monday that help establish spiritual disciplines. Deeper Dive on Wednesdays will strengthen your understanding of the Bible. On Friday we release Lighten Up, to encourage and get you through the weekend.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
